sentences.en: An abnormally large red blood cell , especially one associated with pernicious anemia.
sentences.cn: 一种贫血症特征是红细胞平均比正常大.

sentences.en: Business may be troublesome, but idleness is pernicious.
sentences.cn: 事业虽扰人, 怠惰害更大.

sentences.en: Do not use power to suppress opinions you think pernicious.
sentences.cn: 不要用权力去压制你认为有害的意见.

sentences.en: I did what I could, but her mother's influence was pernicious.
sentences.cn: 我已尽力了，但是她母亲贻害颇深。

sentences.en: In present circumstances, revisionism is more pernicious than dogmatism.
sentences.cn: 在现在的情况下, 修正主义是比教条主义更有害的东西.

sentences.en: Lack of intrinsic factor can result in pernicious anemia.
sentences.cn: 缺乏内源因素可导致恶性贫血.

sentences.en: Pernicious anemia in human is due to failure of absorption of vitamin B 12.
sentences.cn: 人的恶性贫血是由于不能吸收维生素B12的结果.

sentences.en: The most pernicious enemy is the man of Moderation.
sentences.cn: 最有害的敌人是那些不偏不倚者.

sentences.en: The negative and cognitive symptoms are less dramatic but more pernicious.
sentences.cn: 至于负性及认知的症状就没那麽戏剧性,但更为恶毒.

sentences.en: The pernicious effect of this advertising on children is a problem that we ignore at our peril.
sentences.cn: 这则广告将对孩子有潜移默化的坏影响,我们置之不理,风险将由我们自己来承担.

sentences.en: The principle had been pernicious from beginning to end.
sentences.cn: 这条原则自始至终都是有害的.

sentences.en: There is a pernicious culture of excellence: everything has to be not merely good but the best.
sentences.cn: 对于优秀存在着一种认识的误区：一切都务求最好。

sentences.en: They are silent with regard to the pernicious effects of their own gains.
sentences.cn: 关于由自己得利而产生的恶果,他们保持沉默.

sentences.en: They don't really, in their ivory towers, understand how pernicious drug crime is.
sentences.cn: 他们身处象牙塔中，并不真正了解毒品犯罪的危害有多大。

trans.tran_cn: 很有害的，恶性的，致命的，险恶的，引起巨大伤害的，毁灭性的
trans.tran_en: very harmful or evil, often in a way that you do not notice easily
